trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGME112_04943_SEQ_00<tab>Wuk Lamat wishes to do what she can for the people of Solution Nine.
TEXT_KINGME112_04943_TODO_00<tab>Comfort the civilians.
TEXT_KINGME112_04943_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Wuk Lamat in the Backroom.
TEXT_KINGME112_04943_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Gulool Ja.
TEXT_KINGME112_04943_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Wuk Lamat.
TEXT_KINGME112_04943_TODO_04<tab>Speak with Cahciua.
TEXT_KINGME112_04943_ALISAIE_000_001<tab> Thank you, Otis... I pray your soul is at peace.
TEXT_KINGME112_04943_KRILE_000_005<tab>To slaughter his adopted people too... Is there no end to his villainy?
TEXT_KINGME112_04943_GRAHATIA_000_010<tab>I did not expect that such carnage would unfold here...
TEXT_KINGME112_04943_WUKLAMAT_000_020<tab>I've been thinking... By wearing regulators, the people of Alexandria had been spared the fear of death.

TEXT_KINGME112_04943_WUKLAMAT_000_021<tab>That's because the device not only resurrects you─it also erases your memories of the departed. The very notion of dying would have become vague, if not forgotten.
TEXT_KINGME112_04943_WUKLAMAT_000_022<tab>To be killed over and over... I can't imagine how traumatized the survivors must be. Even if they're not physically hurt, they would still need care.
TEXT_KINGME112_04943_GRAHATIA_000_023<tab>At a time like this, the citizens need their queen to console them. But where has she gone?
TEXT_KINGME112_04943_WUKLAMAT_000_024<tab>I don't know. There are other districts, so perhaps she's checking on them.
TEXT_KINGME112_04943_WUKLAMAT_000_025<tab>In any case, it's too much for her to handle alone...
TEXT_KINGME112_04943_WUKLAMAT_000_026<tab>Countless people will be distraught, and we ought to provide them with what comfort we can.
TEXT_KINGME112_04943_WUKLAMAT_000_027<tab>So while Cahciua and her crew tend to those with physical injuries, let's seek out those whose wounds are emotional.
TEXT_KINGME112_04943_ALISAIE_000_028<tab>Understood. If you and <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> want to concentrate on True Vue, the rest of us will see to the other areas.
TEXT_KINGME112_04943_WUKLAMAT_000_029<tab>Sounds like a plan. Alright, everyone─we'll meet up in the Backroom after.
TEXT_KINGME112_04943_STUNNEDRESIDENT4943_000_030<tab>It...it's over? I'm still alive...?
TEXT_KINGME112_04943_STUNNEDRESIDENT4943_000_031<tab>Ahhh, thank goodness... <sniff> <sob>
TEXT_KINGME112_04943_STUNNEDRESIDENT4943_000_032<tab>It makes no sense... What right did the king have to destroy our lives like this?
TEXT_KINGME112_04943_STUNNEDRESIDENT4943_000_033<tab>Give us back our peace... Leave us out of your damned war... <sob>
TEXT_KINGME112_04943_STUNNEDRESIDENT4943_000_035<tab>I want no part in it. I just want peace again...
TEXT_KINGME112_04943_TREMBLINGRESIDENT4943_000_040<tab><shudder> Never have I been so scared in my life... I'd died in an accident before, but it was nothing compared to this...
TEXT_KINGME112_04943_TREMBLINGRESIDENT4943_000_041<tab>To be killed again, and again, and again... It was a living nightmare. And King Zoraal Ja was behind it, you say?

TEXT_KINGME112_04943_TREMBLINGRESIDENT4943_000_042<tab>Since he suddenly appeared, he's done nothing good for us. He thinks only of war─ordered more soldiers be produced. And now he unleashes them on us...
TEXT_KINGME112_04943_TREMBLINGRESIDENT4943_000_043<tab>He's no king of mine! He's a murderer, and someone needs to make him pay!
TEXT_KINGME112_04943_TREMBLINGRESIDENT4943_000_045<tab>Zoraal Ja must answer for his crimes! The false king must be ripped from his throne!
TEXT_KINGME112_04943_EXHAUSTEDRESIDENT4943_000_050<tab>Th-Thank you... I'm all right, I think...
TEXT_KINGME112_04943_EXHAUSTEDRESIDENT4943_000_051<tab>Say, you were fighting with Queen Sphene, weren't you? Are the rumors true, then?

TEXT_KINGME112_04943_EXHAUSTEDRESIDENT4943_000_052<tab>That Her Majesty isn't a living person. That her actual body is elsewhere─in the cloud or some such─and she uses a special power to appear before us.
TEXT_KINGME112_04943_EXHAUSTEDRESIDENT4943_000_053<tab>I'd always wondered why the Alexandrians never questioned her true nature, but now I think I understand why.
TEXT_KINGME112_04943_EXHAUSTEDRESIDENT4943_000_054<tab>She personally fought to protect us. That's enough for me to know she's a worthy ruler. It doesn't matter what she is.
TEXT_KINGME112_04943_EXHAUSTEDRESIDENT4943_000_055<tab>To fight for her people is proof of her dedication to her people. Whatever she may be, she is our queen.
TEXT_KINGME112_04943_CAHCIUA_000_060<tab>We've helped those we could in Solution Nine. We're now looking to send people to the other levels.
TEXT_KINGME112_04943_GULOOLJA_000_065<tab>...
TEXT_KINGME112_04943_WUKLAMAT_000_090<tab>It seems things are somewhat under control. While Alisaie and the others are still out there...
TEXT_KINGME112_04943_WUKLAMAT_000_091<tab>I couldn't help but worry about Gulool Ja.
TEXT_KINGME112_04943_CAHCIUA_000_092<tab>He hasn't uttered a word. And small wonder given his ordeal...
TEXT_KINGME112_04943_WUKLAMAT_000_093<tab>I'm going to talk to him. About everything.
TEXT_KINGME112_04943_WUKLAMAT_000_094<tab>Bright as he is, there's no use hiding it. He'd eventually find out, and it'd hurt him more.
TEXT_KINGME112_04943_CAHCIUA_000_095<tab>Very well. Above all, he needs to know that he isn't alone.
TEXT_KINGME112_04943_CAHCIUA_000_100<tab>To make your own child suffer so... I cannot comprehend the heartlessness.
TEXT_KINGME112_04943_WUKLAMAT_000_105<tab>I'll leave nothing out. Neither what's happened, nor what's still to come...
TEXT_KINGME112_04943_CAHCIUA_000_110<tab>They had been keeping a lot inside, both Gulool Ja and Wuk Lamat...
TEXT_KINGME112_04943_GULOOLJA_000_113<tab>I'm sorry I didn't listen and followed you.
TEXT_KINGME112_04943_GULOOLJA_000_114<tab>But...I wanted to stop my father. And to maybe understand why he did what he did.
TEXT_KINGME112_04943_WUKLAMAT_000_115<tab>You should get some rest, Gulool Ja. You've been through a lot.
TEXT_KINGME112_04943_GULOOLJA_000_116<tab>I do feel a bit sleepy...
TEXT_KINGME112_04943_CAHCIUA_000_117<tab>There's a room in the back you can use. Could you take Gulool Ja there?
TEXT_KINGME112_04943_WUKLAMAT_000_118<tab>I will, thank you.
TEXT_KINGME112_04943_CAHCIUA_000_120<tab>The things I would say to Zoraal Ja as a mother... But I'd better not get started.
TEXT_KINGME112_04943_CAHCIUA_000_121<tab>Instead, let me thank you. We couldn't have gotten through this without you and yours.
TEXT_KINGME112_04943_CAHCIUA_000_122<tab>Until the others return, you ought to take what rest you can as well. It isn't over yet, after all.
TEXT_KINGME112_04943_CAHCIUA_000_123<tab>You could head...<buzzz>...prepare for...<buzzz> Otherwise feel free...<buzzz>...the Backroom.
TEXT_KINGME112_04943_CAHCIUA_000_124<tab>A fuzzy image, you say? Is it still happening?
TEXT_KINGME112_04943_CAHCIUA_000_125<tab>Well, it's an old worn thing. There's bound to be a few hitches.
TEXT_KINGME112_04943_CAHCIUA_000_126<tab>It's nothing to worry about, though. We'll have a meeting to discuss our next move in a little while, so until then!
